title: CE60043: Advanced Structural Analysis - Quick Facts
text:
CE60043
Course name | Advanced Structural Analysis
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 4-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, variational principles; Finite element techniques - element properties; Application to plane stress, plane strain, axi-symmetric, plate bending analysis. Application to 3-D analysis; Non linear material and geometric problems; Finite difference and finite strip techniques; Boundary element method applicable to stress analysis; Special topics.
